title: Bug 117730SVG output is blank in IE with J2EE 1.4.210
description: I installed the J2EE from sun: http://java.sun.com/j2ee/1.4/download.htmlsdk .I think I did the full install, I got a appserver directory on my drive, anduse the jdk inside this directory.When trying to render SVG charts, it doesn't output the xmlns namespace, as aresult IE shows a blank rectangle for the SVG content.<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF8"?<svg xmlns=""xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" height="333.0" width="533.0"<gstyle="fill:none;stroke:none"<defs/<script<![CDATA[function BuildHelper(tag,attrList, text) {this.tag = tag;this.attrList = attrList;this.text= text;this.element= null;this.textNode = null;}It works fine with a standard j2se install
